home.title: Multi-Model Deepfake Detection
home.subtitle: Professional authenticity analysis using 5 advanced AI models. Get detailed reports with heatmap visualizations and confidence scores.
home.tryItDescription: Upload an image to see how our detection pipeline works.
home.signInToSave: Sign in to save your analysis history and unlock more features.
home.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need for professional deepfake detection.
home.readyDescription: Join thousands of researchers, journalists, and security professionals using DeepVerify.

modelPipeline.title: 5-Model AI Pipeline
modelPipeline.description: Multiple state-of-the-art detection models analyze your image simultaneously.

heatmap.title: Heatmap Visualization
heatmap.description: Interactive heatmaps show exactly where models detect manipulation.

accuracy.title: High Accuracy
accuracy.description: Ensemble model approach achieves industry-leading detection accuracy.

fast.title: Fast Processing
fast.description: Optimized inference pipeline returns results in seconds.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: All images processed locally and protected with strict privacy standards.

downloadable.title: Downloadable Reports
downloadable.description: Export full reconstruction and report data in PDF format.

upload.title: Upload an image to analyze
upload.description: Drag and drop your image here, or click to browse
upload.uploadSucceeded: Upload succeeded but server response was unexpected.
upload.notSignedIn: You are not signed in. You can still upload, but some features may require an account.
upload.supportedFormats: Supported: JPG, PNG — max 10MB. By uploading you agree to our terms.

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Sign up to get started
register.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

dashboard.title: Analysis History
dashboard.subtitle: Your recent deepfake detection analyses
dashboard.noAnalysesDescription: Upload your first image to start detecting deepfakes with our multi-model analysis pipeline.

result.title: Analysis Results
result.rerunStarted: Analysis re-run started! The page will update automatically.
result.rerunError: Failed to re-run analysis. Please try again.

consensus.finalVerdict: Final verdict based on multiple detection models

loggedIn.quickVerify: Quick Verify — Upload an image to start analysis
loggedIn.quickVerifyDescription: Fast, explainable, multi-model authenticity checks. Your uploads are private and processed quickly.
loggedIn.uploadDescription: Drag & drop an image (PNG, JPG). Results include a consensus verdict, confidence scores, and heatmaps.
loggedIn.contactSupport: Contact our research team for deeper analysis and consulting.

membership.title: Membership plans for professionals
membership.subtitle: Unlock priority processing, batch uploads, and downloadable reports. Select a plan that fits your team's needs.
membership.priorityProcessingDesc: Shorter queue times for time-sensitive analysis.
membership.downloadableReportsDesc: Export PDFs with model outputs and heatmaps.
membership.cancelAnswer: Yes — monthly plans can be cancelled from your account page without penalties.
membership.teamPlans: Do you offer team or enterprise plans?
membership.teamPlansAnswer: Yes — contact our sales team via the Support page for a tailored plan.

support.title: Support & Help Center
support.subtitle: We're here to help. Submit a ticket below or browse documentation and FAQs.
support.name: Name
